SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwTTAdvancementQuestScript


; For the purposes of determining Skills in this Script, the Secondary Skills are ignored.  They are a joke and not worth the added complexity

; 0 = Layman	    0 TempleReputation,	Intelligence 30, Personality 30
; 1 = Novice		    5 TempleReputation,	Intelligence 30, Personality 30, One Skill at 10
; 2 = Initiate		  10 TempleReputation,	Intelligence 30, Personality 30, One Skill at 20
; 3 = Acolyte		  20 TempleReputation,	Intelligence 30, Personality 30, One Skill at 30 + Two Skills at   5
; 4 = Adept		  30 TempleReputation,	Intelligence 30, Personality 30, One Skill at 40 + Two Skills at 10
; 5 = Curate		  45 TempleReputation,	Intelligence 31, Personality 31, One Skill at 50 + Two Skills at 15
; 6 = Disciple	  60 TempleReputation,	Intelligence 32, Personality 32, One Skill at 60 + Two Skills at 20
; 7 = Diviner		  80 TempleReputation,	Intelligence 33, Personality 33, One Skill at 70 + Two Skills at 25
; 8 = Master		100 TempleReputation,	Intelligence 34, Personality 34, One Skill at 80 + Two Skills at 30
; 9 = Patriarch	125 TempleReputation,	Intelligence 35, Personality 35, One Skill at 90 + Two Skills at 35

; Temple = Alchemy, Blunt, Conjuration, Mysticism, Restoration, HandToHand

SHORT TempleAdvancement
; 0 = Nothing Qualifies
; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not
; 3 = Qualified For Advancement
; 4 = Script Needs To Set Next Rank
; 5 = No More Advancement

SHORT TempleReputation

SHORT QualifyReputation
SHORT QualifySkills

short ExpelledOnce



BEGIN GameMode

	if PlayerInMorrowind == 0
		return	;there really is no need to run this in Cyrodiil
	endif

	If Player.GetInFaction 0Temple == 0
		return
	endif

;This part of the script handles expulsion

	If Player.GetInFaction 0Temple
		If GetPCFactionSteal 0Temple
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0Temple)
				SetPCExpelled 0Temple 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from the Temple."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionSteal 0Temple 0
			endif
		EndIf

		If GetPCFactionAttack 0Temple
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0Temple)
				SetPCExpelled 0Temple 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from the Temple."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionAttack 0Temple 0
			endif
		EndIf
	EndIf

;The rest of the script below handles skill checks and advancement

	SET QualifyReputation TO 0
	SET QualifySkills TO 0

	IF TempleAdvancement == 4 ; Need To Set Next Rank
		IF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement == 10
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 11
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement == 20
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 21
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement == 30
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 31
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement == 40
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 41
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement == 50
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 51
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement == 60
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 61
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement == 70
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 71
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement == 80
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 81
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement == 90
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 91
			SET TempleAdvancement TO 5
			RETURN
		ENDIF

		SET TempleAdvancement TO 0
		RETURN
	ENDIF ; TempleAdvancement == 4

	IF TempleAdvancement == 3 || TempleAdvancement == 5
		RETURN
	ENDIF



	IF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement < 10 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Temple == 0
		IF TempleReputation >= 5
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 10 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 10 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 10 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 10 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 10 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 10
			SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
		ENDIF

		IF QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 10
			SET TempleAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement < 20 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Temple == 1
		IF TempleReputation >= 10
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 30 && Player.GetAV Personality >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 20 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 20 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 20 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 20 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 20 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 20
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 20
			SET TempleAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement < 30 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Temple == 2
		IF TempleReputation >= 20
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 30 && Player.GetAV Personality >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 30 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 30 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 30 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 30 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 30 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 30
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 30
			SET TempleAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement < 40 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Temple == 3
		IF TempleReputation >= 30
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 30 && Player.GetAV Personality >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 40 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 40 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 40 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 40 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 40 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 40
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 40
			SET TempleAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement < 50 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Temple == 4
		IF TempleReputation >= 45
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 31 && Player.GetAV Personality >= 31
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 50 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 50 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 50 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 50 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 50 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 50
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 50
			SET TempleAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement < 60 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Temple == 5
		IF TempleReputation >= 60
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 32 && Player.GetAV Personality >= 32
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 60 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 60 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 60 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 60 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 60 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 60
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 60
			SET TempleAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement < 70 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Temple == 6
		IF TempleReputation >= 80
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 33 && Player.GetAV Personality >= 33
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 70 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 70 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 70 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 70 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 70 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 70
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 70
			SET TempleAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement < 80 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Temple == 7
		IF TempleReputation >= 100
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 34 && Player.GetAV Personality >= 34
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 80 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 80 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 80 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 80 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 80 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 80
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 80
			SET TempleAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTTAdvancement < 90 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Temple == 8
		IF TempleReputation >= 125
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 35 && Player.GetAV Personality >= 35
			IF Player.GetAV Alchemy >= 90 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 90 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 90 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 90 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 90 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 90
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTTAdvancement 90
			SET TempleAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ENDIF


; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not

	IF QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET TempleAdvancement TO 0
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET TempleAdvancement TO 1
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 1
		SET TempleAdvancement TO 2
	ENDIF
END ; GameMode
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 2077 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>

SLSD - Local Variable Data.Unused: CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
